com.hcl.domino.richtext.structures

Interface ResizableMemoryStructure

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MemoryStructure
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AssistFieldStruct, CDAction, CDActionBar, CDActionBarExt, CDActionByForm, CDBegin, CDBlobPart, CDCaption, CDDDEBegin, CDEnd, CDEvent, CDFileHeader, CDFileSegment, CDGraphic, CDHotspotBegin, CDHotspotEnd, CDImageHeader, CDImageHeader2, CDImageSegment, CDParagraph, CDText, RichTextRecord<T>

    public interface ResizableMemoryStructure
extends MemoryStructure
    This sub-interface of MemoryStructure represents a structure that is expected to have resizable variable data.
    Since:
    1.0.15
    Author:
    Jesse Gallagher

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ByteBuffer getVariableData()
      Returns the portion of the data after the defined structure (e.g.
      void resize(int size)
      Resizes the backing memory to the provided size.
      void resizeVariableData(int size)
      Resizes the variable portion of this record to the provided size.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.hcl.domino.richtext.structures.MemoryStructure

        getData

    • Method Detail

      • resize

        void resize(int size)
        Resizes the backing memory to the provided size.
        Parameters:
        size - the new size in bytes

      • getVariableData

        ByteBuffer getVariableData()
        Returns the portion of the data after the defined structure (e.g. the text portion of a CDTEXT record).

        This byte buffer starts at the beginning of the variable data and has a length equal to the variable data length.

        Returns:
        a ByteBuffer representing the variable-length data of the record

      • resizeVariableData

        void resizeVariableData(int size)
        Resizes the variable portion of this record to the provided size.
        Parameters:
        size - the new size in bytes
        Since:
        1.0.15
